typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT as string,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT as string,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM as string,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE as string,
		BASE_AIR_PORT as string,
		CRGO_WGT as string,
		ESTD_ARRVL as string,
		ESTD_DPTR as string,
		FLT_DT as string,
		FLT_ID as integer,
		FLT_NUM as string,
		FLT_TYPE as string,
		FUEL_IN as double,
		FUEL_OUT as double,
		FUEL_UPLIFT as integer,
		IS_CNCLD as boolean,
		IS_VERFD as boolean,
		MAINT_LOG_PG as integer,
		NOTES as string,
		SCHDD_ARRVL as string,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT as string,
		SCHDD_DPTR as string,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT as string,
		UPDTD_AT as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StgFlights
source(output(
		Airport_Name as string,
		City as string,
		Country as string,
		IATA as string,
		ICAO as string,
		Latitude as double,
		Longitude as double,
		Altitude as integer,
		UTC_offset as double,
		DST as string,
		Time_Zone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> BdavisAirport
RemoveADFColumns split(isNull(FLT_DT) || isNull(FLT_ID) || isNull(FLT_NUM) || isNull(FLT_TYPE) || isNull(SCHDD_DPTR) || isNull(UPDTD_AT) ||
iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_IN), false(), iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_ON), iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_OUT), false(), ACTL_OOOI_IN>ACTL_OOOI_OUT), ACTL_OOOI_IN<ACTL_OOOI_ON)) || 
iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_OFF), iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_ON), false(),true()), iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_OUT), false(), ACTL_OOOI_OFF<ACTL_OOOI_OUT)) ||
iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_ON), iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_IN), false(), true()), iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_IN), false(), ACTL_OOOI_ON<ACTL_OOOI_OFF)) ||
iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_OUT), iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_OFF), false(), true()), false()) ||
iif(isNull(ESTD_ARRVL), iif(isNull(ESTD_DPTR), false(), true()), ESTD_ARRVL<ESTD_DPTR) ||
iif(isNull(SCHDD_ARRVL), true(), SCHDD_ARRVL<SCHDD_DPTR),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Reject, FilterData)
ConditionalSplit2@ActlArrvlAirportNotNull, BdavisAirport exists(ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT == IATA,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportExists
ConditionalSplit2@ActlArrvlAirportNotNull, BdavisAirport exists(ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT == IATA,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportDoesntExists1
IATAAirportDoesntExists1, BdavisAirport exists(toString(ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT)  == ICAO,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportExists
IATAAirportExists, ICAOAirportExists union(byName: true)~> ExsistUnion
IATAAirportDoesntExists1, BdavisAirport exists(ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT == ICAO,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportdoesntExists
AddRejectReason2, AddRejectReason1 union(byName: true)~> RejectUnion1
ConditionalSplit1@Reject derive(Reject_Reason = "Validation Error") ~> AddRejectReason1
ICAOAirportdoesntExists derive(Reject_Reason = "Invalid ACTL_ARRVL Airport Name") ~> AddRejectReason2
ConditionalSplit1@FilterData split(isNull(ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit2@(ActlArrvlAirportNull, ActlArrvlAirportNotNull)
ExsistUnion, ConditionalSplit2@ActlArrvlAirportNull union(byName: true)~> FilterUnion1
FilterUnion1 split(isNull(ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit3@(ActlDptrAirportNull, ActlDptrAirportNotNull)
ConditionalSplit3@ActlDptrAirportNotNull, BdavisAirport exists(ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT == IATA,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportDoesntExists2
IATAAirportDoesntExists2, BdavisAirport exists(ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT == ICAO,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportExists2
IATAAirportDoesntExists2, BdavisAirport exists(ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT == ICAO,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportdoesntExists2
ICAOAirportdoesntExists2 derive(Reject_Reason = "Actl Dptr Airport Name not found") ~> AddRejectReason3
RejectUnion1, AddRejectReason3 union(byName: true)~> RejectUnion2
ExistUnion2, ConditionalSplit3@ActlDptrAirportNull union(byName: true)~> FilterUnion2
FilterUnion2 split(isNull(BASE_AIR_PORT),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit4@(BaseAirportNull, BaseAirportNotNull)
ConditionalSplit4@BaseAirportNotNull, BdavisAirport exists(BASE_AIR_PORT == IATA,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportExists3
ConditionalSplit4@BaseAirportNotNull, BdavisAirport exists(BASE_AIR_PORT == IATA,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportDoesntExists3
ConditionalSplit3@ActlDptrAirportNotNull, BdavisAirport exists(ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT == IATA,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportExists2
IATAAirportDoesntExists3, BdavisAirport exists(BASE_AIR_PORT == ICAO,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportExists3
IATAAirportDoesntExists3, BdavisAirport exists(BASE_AIR_PORT == ICAO,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportdoesntExists3
ExistUnion3, ConditionalSplit4@BaseAirportNull union(byName: true)~> FilterUnion3
ICAOAirportdoesntExists3 derive(Reject_Reason = "Base Airport Name not found") ~> AddRejectReason4
ICAOAirportExists2, IATAAirportExists2 union(byName: true)~> ExistUnion2
IATAAirportExists3, ICAOAirportExists3 union(byName: true)~> ExistUnion3
RejectUnion2, AddRejectReason4 union(byName: true)~> RejectUnion3
FilterUnion3 split(isNull(SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT),
	disjoint: false) ~> SchdArrvlAirportNull@(SchdArrvlAirportNull, SchdArrvlAirportNotNull)
SchdArrvlAirportNull@SchdArrvlAirportNotNull, BdavisAirport exists(SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT == IATA,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportDoesntExists4
IATAAirportDoesntExists4, BdavisAirport exists(SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT == ICAO,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportExists4
IATAAirportDoesntExists4, BdavisAirport exists(SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT == ICAO,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportDoesntExists4
SchdArrvlAirportNull@SchdArrvlAirportNotNull, BdavisAirport exists(SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT == IATA,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportExists4
ICAOAirportExists4, IATAAirportExists4 union(byName: true)~> ExistUnion4
ExistUnion4, SchdArrvlAirportNull@SchdArrvlAirportNull union(byName: true)~> FilterUnion4
ICAOAirportDoesntExists4 derive(Reject_Reason = "Schd Arrvl Airport Name not found") ~> AddRejectReason5
FilterUnion4 split(isNull(SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT),
	disjoint: false) ~> SchdDptrAirportNull@(SchdDptrAirportNull, SchdDptrAirportNotNull)
SchdDptrAirportNull@SchdDptrAirportNotNull, BdavisAirport exists(SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT == IATA,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportDoesntExists5
IATAAirportDoesntExists5, BdavisAirport exists(SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT == ICAO,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportExists5
IATAAirportDoesntExists5, BdavisAirport exists(SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT == ICAO,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportDoesntExists5
SchdDptrAirportNull@SchdDptrAirportNotNull, BdavisAirport exists(SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT == IATA,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportExists5
ICAOAirportExists5, IATAAirportExists5 union(byName: true)~> ExistUnion5
ExistUnion5, SchdDptrAirportNull@SchdDptrAirportNull union(byName: true)~> FilterUnion5
ICAOAirportDoesntExists5 derive(Reject_Reason = "Schd Dptr Airport Name not found") ~> AddRejectReason6
RejectUnion3, AddRejectReason5 union(byName: true)~> RejectUnion4
RejectUnion4, AddRejectReason6 union(byName: true)~> RejectUnion5
StgFlights select(mapColumn(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE,
		BASE_AIR_PORT,
		CRGO_WGT,
		ESTD_ARRVL,
		ESTD_DPTR,
		FLT_DT,
		FLT_ID,
		FLT_NUM,
		FLT_TYPE,
		FUEL_IN,
		FUEL_OUT,
		FUEL_UPLIFT,
		IS_CNCLD,
		IS_VERFD,
		MAINT_LOG_PG,
		NOTES,
		SCHDD_ARRVL,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		SCHDD_DPTR,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		UPDTD_AT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveADFColumns
RejectUnion5 sink(input(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT as string,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN as timestamp,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF as timestamp,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON as timestamp,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT as timestamp,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM as string,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE as string,
		BASE_AIR_PORT as string,
		CRGO_WGT as integer,
		ESTD_ARRVL as timestamp,
		ESTD_DPTR as timestamp,
		FLT_DT as date,
		FLT_ID as long,
		FLT_NUM as string,
		FLT_TYPE as string,
		FUEL_IN as double,
		FUEL_OUT as double,
		FUEL_UPLIFT as integer,
		IS_CNCLD as boolean,
		IS_VERFD as boolean,
		MAINT_LOG_PG as string,
		NOTES as string,
		SCHDD_ARRVL as timestamp,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT as string,
		SCHDD_DPTR as timestamp,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT as string,
		UPDTD_AT as timestamp,
		REJECT_REASON as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE,
		BASE_AIR_PORT,
		FLT_ID,
		FLT_NUM,
		FLT_TYPE,
		FUEL_IN,
		FUEL_OUT,
		FUEL_UPLIFT,
		IS_CNCLD,
		IS_VERFD,
		NOTES,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		REJECT_REASON = Reject_Reason,
		ADF_TIME_STMP,
		ADF_RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Reject
FilterUnion5 sink(input(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT as string,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT as string,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM as string,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE as string,
		BASE_AIR_PORT as string,
		CRGO_WGT as string,
		ESTD_ARRVL as string,
		ESTD_DPTR as string,
		FLT_DT as string,
		FLT_ID as integer,
		FLT_NUM as string,
		FLT_TYPE as string,
		FUEL_IN as double,
		FUEL_OUT as double,
		FUEL_UPLIFT as integer,
		IS_CNCLD as boolean,
		IS_VERFD as boolean,
		MAINT_LOG_PG as integer,
		NOTES as string,
		SCHDD_ARRVL as string,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT as string,
		SCHDD_DPTR as string,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT as string,
		UPDTD_AT as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> FlightsTest
